typography.headingStyle: Bold sans-serif, dark gray/black, large sizes (32px+)
typography.dataStyle: Monospace or bold sans-serif for prices/numbers, green for positive changes, light gray for secondary metrics

components.description: Dark blue-gray banner with market stats ticker, notification banner, and auth buttons
components.notable: Feature announcement banner (Track Multiple Wallets) integrated into header

components.description: Horizontal tabs (Cryptocurrencies, Exchanges, NFT, Learn, Products, API) with logo
components.notable: Branded Candy and Portfolio features highlighted in secondary nav

components.description: Three key metrics (Market Cap, 24h Volume) with inline sparkline charts
components.notable: Green uptrend line for market cap, red downtrend for volume

components.description: Three-column card layout showing trending coins and top gainers
components.notable: Uses emoji avatars and percentage badges with green/red styling

components.description: Sortable table with rank, coin name, price, % changes, volume, market cap, and 7-day chart
components.notable: Each row includes a mini sparkline chart; star icons for favoriting; Buy badges on prices

design.visualHierarchy: Top-down: Market stats → Summary cards → Trending section → Full data table. Green accents draw focus to positive changes.
innovativeElements: Integrated sparkline charts within summary cards and table rows
Feature announcement banner with close button in header
Multi-section browsing with filter tabs (All, Highlights, Categories, Intent, MEV Protection, Clanker Ecosystem)
Customize button to save user preferences

flow.userIntent: Browse and compare cryptocurrency prices, volumes, and market cap data; discover trending and top-performing coins
exitPoints: Click specific coin to view details
Navigate to Exchanges, NFT, Learn, or API sections
Filter by category (Intent, MEV Protection, etc.)

interactiveElements.action: Click to see market cap trends or drill into details

interactiveElements.element: Filter Tabs (All, Highlights, Categories, Intent, MEV Protection, Clanker Ecosystem)
interactiveElements.action: Click to filter displayed coins by category
Click coin name or row to view detailed coin page
Open preferences modal to customize table columns/display

flow.informationArchitecture: Hierarchical: global market summary → trending/hot coins → comprehensive sortable table. Categories and filters allow users to segment data by use case.
progressIndicators: Market Cap percentage change (4.8%) with green indicator

copy.headline: Cryptocurrency Prices by Market Cap
copy.subheadline: The global cryptocurrency market cap today is $2.48 Trillion, a 4.8% change in the last 24 hours.

ctas.placement: Bottom-right of Trending and Top Gainers cards

microcopy.context: Badge next to Bitcoin and Ethereum prices

microcopy.purpose: Show curated list of important coins

trustSignals: "world's largest independent crypto data authority since 2014"

design.colorScheme: dark overlay with light content background

typography.bodyStyle: Regular sans-serif, light gray/white, 14px, left-aligned in modal

components.description: Centered dark overlay with bold headline and subheadline text
components.notable: Large bold text on dark background creates strong contrast

components.description: Layered screenshot mockups showing CoinGecko interface and code editor
components.notable: Gradient frame (green-to-beige) creates visual depth; shows product in use

components.description: Dark modal overlay (80% opacity) with privacy policy text and buttons
components.notable: Split-column layout: left text, right purposes list + button panel

components.description: Three buttons: 'I Accept' (green), 'Reject All' (outlined), 'Show Purposes' (outlined green)
components.notable: Vertical stack of buttons with consistent green theme

design.visualHierarchy: Dark overlay focuses attention on headline and CTA, product imagery provides visual proof, privacy modal grounds user in consent requirements
innovativeElements: Gradient frame effect on product screenshots (green → beige)
Dual-layer modal approach: hero section + consent modal
Two-column privacy text layout (left: description, right: purposes list)

flow.userIntent: Understand API offering for enterprise use; acknowledge privacy/data usage policies before accessing site
entryPoints: User navigates to CoinGecko API page
exitPoints: Click 'Contact Sales' to inquire about enterprise API
Click 'I Accept' to close privacy modal and continue browsing
Click 'Reject All' to refuse tracking (if compliant)
Click 'Show Purposes' to expand privacy details
Click 'More Information' link to view full privacy policy

interactiveElements.action: Navigate to sales inquiry form or contact page
Accept all tracking/data purposes and close privacy modal
Reject non-essential tracking (close modal or set limited consent)
Expand detailed list of data processing purposes
Open full privacy policy in new tab/page

flow.informationArchitecture: Hero messaging layer above product showcase, privacy consent modal anchored at bottom with detailed explanation and options
frictionPoints: Privacy modal is mandatory and blocks interaction
Small text in privacy notice may reduce readability
Multiple consent options might confuse users about implications

copy.headline: Enterprise-grade Crypto & Onchain Data API, Built for Scale
copy.subheadline: Get complete coverage of the crypto market delivered by CoinGecko API, the world's largest independent crypto data authority since 2014.

microcopy.text: We and our 966 partners store and access personal data, like browsing data or unique identifiers, on your device.

Use precise geolocation data. Actively scan device characteristics for identification. Store and/or access information on a device. Personalised advertising and content, advertising and content measurement, audience research and services development.

trustSignals: "world's largest independent crypto data authority since 2014"
copy.jargonLevel: intermediate (headline/API context) to beginner (privacy notice simplification)
